wikipedia_page.main: Patti Flynn (born Patricia Maude Young, 1937 – 10 September 2020) was a jazz singer, author, radio actress, model and social activist. She was a founder and patron of Black History Wales. In 2019 she was honoured with the Ethnic Minority Welsh Women Achievement Association's (EMWWAA) Lifetime Achievement Award.

response: * Patti Flynn (1937–2020), jazz singer, author, radio actress, model and social activist
